text: by using AWS Services it gives us the uh
flexibility of uh low cost set up on the
environment and gives us the ability to
build up uh capacity to serve customers
and that leads to better services and
happier customers my name is
chaiwat I am chief technology officer of
ia.com at Asen group as a CTO I oversee
the technology development of the
e-commerce platform including our other
services under Asen group ia.com based
in Bangkok Thailand we are one of the
fastest growing e-commerce website in
Thailand we offer the best value
merchandises for customers in Thailand
and we are expanding into Asian uh
countries as well we are fast growing we
grew 1,000% in
2014 in this uh in this year in 2015 we
are in in terms of number of users in
every 3 months in e-commerce business
Speed and Agility to release the
software and serve customers is a very
key capability it is a live and ding
capability is not just an option we
wanted to use the full stack of
technology that can help us deliver our
features and software to customers uh
faster we want something that we can uh
provision and do scaling of our capacity
ia.com uses um AWS services on ec2 S3
and direct connect to run our e-commerce
platform We Grew From 100,000 users per
month to 1.6 million users per month and
that is an amazing growth uh during the
day we would run the campaigns for
customers and during the campaign window
we would run the server at the 400% of
the normal capacity ec2 allows us to
boost that capacity in just you know two
or three hours per day and then shut it
down for the cost saving we used to take
couple of Engineers and a couple of days
to build environment but now with AWS
ec2 we just take 20 minutes by anyone in
the team regardless of their experience
by using AWS our development process can
short cut by two to 3 months because we
do not have to spend time and overhead
in the hardware and procurement process
or the environment built out in the data
center since using AWS our developers
have involved more in the deployment
process more depop culture they deploy
features faster they take care of their
services better in reality a lot of
businesses still have existing Services
running on premus with AWS direct
connect it helps us operate the two uh
environments in a way similar to hybrid
architecture and allows us to migrate
the new Services into the cloud to take
benefit of the cloud technology while
still maintaining the existing services
on premise without giving up those
Services ia.com now is running 100% on
AWS with we are also planning for other
services such as the e- payment business
that will go on to the AWS in the near
future including all website services
that we have in the company
